trans-unit.source: dj-nexmo adds a couple of template filters for formatting phone numbers, wrapping the awesome phonenumbers library.
trans-unit.target: dj-nexmo 添加了几个用于格式化电话号码的模板过滤器，包装了很棒的 电话号码库。

trans-unit.source: dj-nexmo configures a Nexmo Client object from the settings above. You can use it by importing it from the djnexmo package:
trans-unit.target: dj-nexmo 通过上述设置配置Nexmo Client 对象。您可以通过从 djnexmo 包中：

trans-unit.source: dj-nexmo provides a view decorator which will ensure your webhook view is only called once all the parts of an SMS are available.
trans-unit.target: dj-nexmo 提供了一个视图装饰器，可确保仅在SMS的所有部分都可用时才调用您的Webhook视图。

trans-unit.source: A decorator for validating and re-combining SMS message parts.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于验证和重新组合SMS信息部分的装饰器。

trans-unit.source: A decorator to validate other webhooks from the Nexmo API.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于验证Nexmo API中其他webhooks的装饰器。

trans-unit.source: A management command for clearing the database of old message parts where not all parts were received.
trans-unit.target: 用于清除数据库中未收到的旧信息部件的管理命令。

trans-unit.source: Add "djnexmo" to INSTALLED_APPS in your settings.
trans-unit.target: 在您的设置 "djnexmo" 添加到 INSTALLED_APPS 。

trans-unit.source: Coming Soon:
trans-unit.target: 很快就到了

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.source: Contribute!
trans-unit.target: 贡献!

trans-unit.source: Currently, dj-nexmoonly supports Python 3.4+, and Django 2.0+. We may backport to Django 1.x, but we have no intention of backporting to Python 2.
trans-unit.target: 目前， dj-nexmo 仅支持Python 3.4+和Django 2.0+。我们可能会向后移植到Django 1.x，但我们无意向后移植到Python 2。

trans-unit.source: DJ-Nexmo
trans-unit.target: DJ-Nexmo

trans-unit.source: First, pip install dj-nexmo
trans-unit.target: 首先， pip install dj-nexmo

trans-unit.source: Formatting Phone Numbers
trans-unit.target: 电话号码的格式化

trans-unit.source: How To Install It
trans-unit.target: 如何安装

trans-unit.source: Incoming SMS
trans-unit.target: 收到的短信

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Run python manage.py migrate djnexmo to create the necessary models.
trans-unit.target: 运行 python manage.py migrate djnexmo 创建必要的模型。

trans-unit.source: Template filters for rendering phone numbers in international and national formats.
trans-unit.target: 用于呈现国际和国内格式的电话号码的模板过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The Nexmo API is awesome - but there are some problems that developers using Nexmo need to solve again and again. This Django app provides Django-specific functionality on top of the Nexmo Client Library for Python! Currently it contains:
trans-unit.target: 该Nexmo API是真棒-但也有一些问题，使用Nexmo需要开发商一次又一次地解决。此Django应用程序在Nexmo Client Python客户端库之上提供了Django特定的功能！当前它包含：

trans-unit.source: This code is open-source, released under the Apache License. This means it is free to use for commercial or non-commercial purposes, and you can make any changes you would like or need.
trans-unit.target: 这段代码是开源的,在Apache许可证下发布。这意味着它可以自由地用于商业或非商业目的,你可以做任何你想要或需要的修改。

trans-unit.source: This optional setting should be set to the ID of a Nexmo Voice application.
trans-unit.target: 这个可选的设置应该设置为Nexmo语音应用的ID。

trans-unit.source: This optional setting should be set to your Nexmo API Key, which you can obtain from the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 这个可选的设置应该设置为您的Nexmo API密钥,您可以从仪表板上获得。

trans-unit.source: This optional setting should be set to your Nexmo API Secret, which you can obtain from the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 这个可选的设置应该设置为您的Nexmo API秘密,您可以从仪表板上获得。

trans-unit.source: This optional setting should be set to your Nexmo Signature Secret, which you can obtain by contacting Nexmo support. You will need this setting if you wish to validate incoming SMS.
trans-unit.target: 这个可选的设置应该设置为您的Nexmo签名密码,您可以通过联系Nexmo支持获得。如果您想验证收到的短信,您将需要这个设置。

trans-unit.source: This optional setting should be set to your Nexmo Voice application's private key, or a path to a file containing your private key.
trans-unit.target: 这个可选的设置应该设置为你的Nexmo语音应用的私钥,或者设置为包含你的私钥的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: This optional setting should be set to your Nexmo signing method, which you should obtain from Nexmo support when you obtain your Nexmo signature secret.
trans-unit.target: 这个可选的设置应该设置为您的Nexmo签名方式,您应该在获得Nexmo签名秘籍时从Nexmo支持处获得。

trans-unit.source: Using the Nexmo Client
trans-unit.target: 使用Nexmo客户端

trans-unit.source: Utilities for Django developers using Nexmo's APIs
trans-unit.target: 为使用Nexmo的API的Django开发者提供的实用工具。

trans-unit.source: We :heart: contributions -- if you'd like help contributing to this project, please contact us! If you want to do anything particularly significant, we recommend you open up an issue to discuss it with us first. If there's something you'd like to see, please open an issue for that too! If you find a bug, please create an issue - any help you can give providing a small code sample that demonstrates the problem you've seen would be very useful and means we should be able to solve your problem sooner!
trans-unit.target: 我们 :heart:贡献 --如果您想为这个项目做出贡献,请联系我们! 如果你想做任何特别重要的事情,我们建议你先开一个问题与我们讨论。如果你有什么想看的东西,也请开一个issue来讨论! 如果你发现了一个bug,请创建一个问题--如果你能提供一个小的代码样本来展示你所看到的问题,你的任何帮助都将是非常有用的,这意味着我们应该能够尽快解决你的问题。
